data.title: Adam Matthew Digital
data.meta_description: Primary source material for the study of the Great War including diaries, personal narratives, trench journals, photographs, posters, cartoons, aerial leaflets, government and military files, and ephemera.

We would like to hear from you!

If you have any queries or feedback about using Age of Exploration, or are experiencing technical difficulties, please get in touch:
